info.title: Open a menu to the last item

setupScript.name: setFocusOnMenuButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the menu button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the menu button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#menubutton1').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Actions' menu button, open the menu.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Actions' menu button, open the menu.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused item, 'menu item', is conveyed
Name of the focused item, 'Action 4', is conveyed
Position of the focused item in the menu (4) is conveyed
Number of items in the menu (4) is conveyed
